thread.title: BBT Hotlist 2016: Nominations now open | Buying Business Travel
thread.title_full: BBT Hotlist 2016: Nominations now open | Buying Business Travel

title: BBT Hotlist 2016: Nominations now open | Buying Business Travel
text:
2 comments BBT Wed, 7 Oct 2015 12:27 Follow @BBT_online We are looking for your nominations on who or what should be included in BBT’s Hotlist for 2016.
This is where we list the people, companies and products driving change, setting agendas and making an impact on business travel based on the opinions of BBT editorial staff, readers and key industry experts... So we want to know your choices.
There is no limit on the amount of nominations you put forward and a short explanation on your choices is also welcome.
This year’s list covered various areas of corporate travel and focused on a variety of people, products and businesses including industry disruptors such as Airbnb and Lastroom, industry influencers such as Chris Pouney and CTM CEO Jamie Pherous as well as influential players in the world of technology such as Uber, Sixt and Silverrail.
To put forward your nominations for next year’s list all you need to do is let us know in the comment box below, tweet @BBT_online or email Digital Editor Tom Newcombe tnewcombe@panaceapublishing.com or BBT Editor Paul Revel prevel@panaceapublishing.com
We will publish the full Hotlist in the first issue of 2016 which is due out in the first week of January.
